Uses of Class
png.ChunkType.Category

  • Packages that use ChunkType.Category 
    Package Description
    common
    Contains shared foundational utilities for byte-level data handling and low-level operations.
    png
    Functionality for parsing and processing PNG image files is provided here.

    • Uses of ChunkType.Category in common

      Methods in common with parameters of type ChunkType.Category 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.Optional<PngDirectory> MetadataContext.getDirectory(ChunkType.Category category)
      Returns a specific PngDirectory wrapped in an Optional if the encapsulated strategy is a PngStrategy and the directory is found.
